# Traitors
Your PDA beeps to life, and begins playing a message: [color:#ff0000]Whiskey, Echo, Whiskey... Lima, Alpha, Delta...[/color] As your PDA returns to silence, you feel determined.
- A Traitor is an antagonist employed by the Syndicate. They have access to various Syndicate tools and weapons through their [color=#a4885c]Uplink[/color]. - Traitors can use codewords to identify themselves to one another in order to cooperate. - In a Traitor round, any player can be a Traitor aside from department heads, the captain, or any security officers. Do note, however; you can still be promoted to these positions after the round begins. - Traitors should focus primarily on completing their objectives successfully by the end of the round, and they should try not to help the station if they can do so without being revealed.
## The Uplink
- The [color=#a4885c]Uplink[/color] is one of the most important tools of Traitor, as it can purchase more tools and weapons with [color=#a4885c]telecrystals[/color](TC).
- 20 [color=#a4885c]Telecrystals[/color] are given at roundstart to give traitors an edge on the station. Other traitors can trade their [color=#a4885c]telecrystals[/color] with (or steal them from) others, exceeding the normal given amount. - You can also obtain 5 extra telecrystals by [color=#ff0000]butchering[/color] (not gibbing!) the captain's pet fox, [color=orange]Renault[/color]. - Using your [color=#a4885c]PDA[/color] and setting the ringtone as your uplink code gives you a variety of options to use at your disposal against the station and its crew.
Make sure to relock your [color=#a4885c]Uplink[/color] in your [color=#a4885c]PDA[/color] to prevent anyone else from seeing it! - Various purchasable gear sets include:
## Objectives
- When becoming a Traitor, you will have a list of objectives; anything from escaping alive and uncuffed, to stealing something, or even killing someone. Using the [color=#a4885c]Uplink[/color]'s can help you with most of these tasks, but you are free to be creative with whatever else you have on hand as well!
## List of Possible Tasks
- Kill or maroon a randomly selected non-traitor. - Kill or maroon a randomly selected traitor. - Kill or maroon a randomly selected department head. - Keep a randomly selected traitor alive. - Leave on the evac shuttle alive and uncuffed. - Hijack the evac shutte and leave with no loyal Nanotrasen crew onboard. {CURRENTLY DISABLED DUE TO BEING NIGH-IMPOSSIBLE TO ACCOMPLISH} - Help a randomly selected traitor finish 2/3 of their objectives. - Die a glorious death. - Steal the Captain's [color=#a4885c]ID Card[/color].
- Steal the Captain's [color=#a4885c]Antique Laser Pistol[/color].

- Steal a slice of fine-cut [color=#a4885c]Corgi Meat[/color], from [bold]only[/bold] the Head of Personnel's pet corgi. (Butcher them for their meat!)
